title: The best jokes
body:
Here are a few of my favourite jokes. I laugh for hours on end reading these and i also stroke my inner thigh.

Two antennas met on a roof, fell in love and got married. The Ceremony wasn't much, but the reception was excellent.

A jumper cable walks into a bar. The bartender says, "I'll serve You, but don't start anything."

Two peanuts walk into a bar, and one was a salted.

A dyslexic man walks into a bra.

A man walks into a bar with a slab of asphalt under his arm and says: "A beer please, and one for the road."

my song
Inner thigh inner thigh your the best ive ever had i touch you soft and stroke my cock (chicken cock) and i smile for hours on end
inner thigh inner thigh how i only touch you when i want to get high you make me smile you make me dance i really love you and for that i say thanks

replies.body: Last 2 were alright. Not funny enough to make me blow air out of my nose though
I wish I could blow air out of your nose if you know what im saying..
Seems like no one has joined the conversation yet, be the first to comment below me! I really like this community{{item:2054}}
